Name:
USS Conner (DD-582)
Aspis (D06)
Fate:
Transferred to Hellenic Navy, 15 September 1959
Sold for scrap, 1997
Range:
6,500 nautical miles at 15 kt
  (12,000 km at 30 km/h)
Armament:
5 × 5 in./38 guns (127 mm),
4 × 40 mm AA guns,
4 × 20 mm AA guns,
10 × 21 in (53 cm) torpedo tubes,
6 × depth charge projectors,
2 × depth charge tracks
